com.dff.sygic.action

Class SygicAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dff.sygic.action.SygicAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SygicPluginAction

    public abstract class SygicAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for all Actions that interact with the sygic api.
    Author:
    dff solutions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SygicApiCallback apiCallback
      Api callback to handle success and error.
      protected java.lang.String name
      Name of the action.
      protected boolean needsAppRunning
      If app is needed by the action.
